name: A Tigers Path
description:
This is our Final Major Project for College called A Tiger's Path!  It is a 3D Story based game involving puzzle solving, exploration with platformer like features. 

≻───── ⋆✩⋆ ─────≺

This Project is a school project that allowed us to create a game that cultivates culture  to convey a cultural message through the use of games!

≻───── ⋆✩⋆ ─────≺

Special thanks to ELAM for giving us the opportunity to create this game!
